articles.title: The Lionel Messi project has failed at PSG - and nobody really cares
articles.description: Argentina's World Cup winner added glamour to an already star-studded project, but we won't remember his performances for the French club
articles.content:
When signing for Paris Saint-Germain, you have to accept that the success or failure of your season is decided in a couple of matches in the spring. Wrapping up the Ligue 1 title is considered a formality. It’s really all about the Champions League.

articles.title: Jill Biden calls on men to support women fighting for rights
articles.description: The group includes the first female general to serve in the Mongolian armed forces, along with advocates for protecting indigenous lands in Costa Rica and ending discrimination against people with disabilities in Malaysia and against LGBTQ people in Argentina.

articles.title: Latin America And Caribbean Passenger Traffic Recovery Slows Slightly In January
articles.description: Argentina had a full domestic traffic recovery for the first time since the pandemic began.
articles.content: The recovery of the Latin American & Caribbean aviation industry has faced a setback, according to the Latin American & Caribbean Air Transport Association (ALTA). About 31.3 million passengers were carried during January in the region, 3.6% below pr... [3127 chars]

articles.title: Argentina makes headway in establishing a cannabis export industry
articles.description: Argentina's new cannabis watchdog is overseeing more than 50 projects related to the research and development of cannabis and is establishing a regulatory framework as it bids to enter the potentially lucrative weed export market.

articles.title: CERAWEEK-Green light for Argentina's gas project with Petronas to come in 2024 -YPF CEO
articles.description: Argentina's state-controlled energy company YPF and Malaysia's Petronas expect to make a final decision next year on whether to invest in the first phase of a massive $60 billion natural gas project in Argentina, the head of YPF said on Wednesday.
articles.content: HOUSTON, March 8 (Reuters) - Argentina's state-controlled energy company YPF (YPFD.BA) and Malaysia's Petronas expect to make a final decision next year on whether to invest in the first phase of a massive $60 billion natural gas project in Argentina... [2421 chars]

articles.title: USDA projects fewer U.S. corn exports in latest report
articles.description: USDA's latest WASDE report cuts Argentina corn and soybean production, reflecting drought damage to the crops.
articles.content:
Today USDA released the latest World Agricultural Supply and Demand Estimates (WASDE) report.
2022/2023 U.S. ENDING STOCKS

articles.description: Kluis says USDA report not likely to reduce size of Argentina crop as much as traders expect.
articles.content:
Corn is currently down 3¢, while soybeans are down 5¢.
CBOT wheat is down 3¢. KC wheat is down a penny. Minneapolis wheat is down 9¢.
